item.title: Nine things about Lesotho - the country 'nobody has ever heard of'
item.description: Lesotho is called the kingdom in the sky - it is the only country entirely above 1,000m.

item.title: Six takeaways from Trump's big speech
item.description: The president declares "America is back" as he spars with Democrats and gives a shout-out to Elon Musk.

item.title: Zelensky's conciliatory letter to Trump suggests he's out of options
item.description: The Ukrainian leader's climb-down on security guarantees may be because the US is the only place he can turn to, writes BBC Ukraine correspondent Jame...

item.title: Pope well-rested after respiratory failure, Vatican says
item.description: The Vatican said Pope Francis spent the night on "non-invasive mechanical ventilation".

item.title: China says it is ready for 'any type of war' with US
item.description: The comments come in response to US tariffs and as Beijing boosts defence spending by 7.2%.
